CircularBuffer.cpp
1#include "CircularBuffer.h"
2
3#include "lerp.h"
4
5namespace xdsp {
6
7template <typename T>
8CircularBuffer<T>::CircularBuffer()
9 : idx_write(0), len_buffer(0), mask_wrap(0) {}
10
11template <typename T>
12void CircularBuffer<T>::clear() {
13 memset(&buffer[0], 0, len_buffer * sizeof(T));
14}
15
16template <typename T>
17void CircularBuffer<T>::init(unsigned int size) {
18 init_power_of_two((unsigned int)(pow(2, ceil(log(size) / log(2)))));
19}
20
21template <typename T>
22void CircularBuffer<T>::init_power_of_two(unsigned int size_power_of_two) {
23 idx_write = 0;
24
25 len_buffer = size_power_of_two;
26
27 mask_wrap = len_buffer - 1;
28
29 buffer.reset(new T[len_buffer]);
30
31 clear();
32}
33
34template <typename T>
35void CircularBuffer<T>::push_sample(T x) {
36 buffer[idx_write++] = x;
37
38 idx_write &= mask_wrap;
39}
40
41template <typename T>
42T CircularBuffer<T>::read(int delay) {
43 int idx_read = (idx_write - 1) - delay;
44 idx_read &= mask_wrap;
45
46 return buffer[idx_read];
47}
48
49template <typename T>
50T CircularBuffer<T>::read(double delay_fractional) {
51 T y1 = read((int)delay_fractional);
52 T y2 = read((int)delay_fractional + 1);
53
54 double fraction = delay_fractional - (int)delay_fractional;
55
56 return lerp::map_norm_unipolar(fraction, y1, y2);
57}
58
59} // namespace xdsp
